title: Ant and Dec get lost in Antarctica in new trailer for I'm A Celebrity
text:
Ant and Dec in new trailer for I’m A Celeb (Picture: ITV/YouTube)

It looks like Ant and Dec are totally ice-olated (sorry not sorry) in the new trailer for the upcoming season of I’m A Celebrity… Get Me Out Of Here.

It was part of a choose-your-own adventure style series that sees fans decide the fate of their favourite presenting pair.

In the trailer, Ant looked comfortable all rugged up in a scarf, gloves and warm clothes as Dec f-f-f-freezed his fingers off (not literally, don’t worry) in nothing but a rolled-up shirt, trousers and thin neckerchief.

You can help Ant and Dec get to Australia (Picture: Anas Chowdhury / ITV)

Dec then said that he’s famished, but Ant doesn’t offer much respite for his frostbite and whipped out an ice lolly.

Fans chose the Arctic Antics outcome over Tropical Tides.

Fans now get to choose on the app whether the boys will end up facing Stormy Seas or Something Fishy next.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Ant and Dec have filmed seven different promos altogether, so viewers really will be in for an epic quest where they get to decide the outcome.

They’ll (hopefully!) get to Australia to coincide with the start of the new series.

Viewers got a first look at the show at the start of this month when the first trailer dropped, featuring Ant back with Dec after Holly Willoughby took over from Ant for her one-time I’m A Celeb hosting gig in 2018.

Now that I’m A Celebrity is officially returning, we shouldn’t just be concerned that Ant and Dec are technically lost at sea, there’s still so much speculation as to who will actually be appearing in the jungle this year.

We’ve compiled a handy break-down of everyone we think is in the running for a place at the campsite.

Capital FM DJ Roman Kemp has also already refused to deny claims that he’s signed up for a stint on the show too.

I’m A Celebrity returns in November on ITV.

Got a showbiz story? If you've got a story, video or pictures get in touch with the Metro.co.uk Entertainment team by emailing us celebtips@metro.co.uk, calling 020 3615 2145 or by visiting our Submit Stuff page - we'd love to hear from you.

MORE: YouTube star Mr Beast pledges to plant 20 million trees by 2020 but he needs your help
description: Ant and Dec have gotten lost in Antarctica while on their way to film the new season of I'm A Celebrity, Get Me Out Of Here.
